com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook

Class ORecordHookAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook.ORecordHookAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ORecordHook
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OCommandCacheHook

    public abstract class ORecordHookAbstract
extends Object
implements ORecordHook
    Hook abstract class that calls separate methods for each hook defined.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli
    See Also:
    ORecordHook
